background.name: House Underling
entries: Your experience as a ledger-keeper for a Dragonmarked House's guild has made you a canny investor and shrewd entrepreneur.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Intelligence or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Society} skill and the {@skill Lore||Business Lore} skill.
You gain the {@feat Experienced Professional} skill feat.
